Today in County Sligo, surf is on at 7 ft @ 13s WNW with fresh 15 mph S winds. Strandhill and Easkey spots are your best bets, especially during their tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions improve with 7 ft @ 11s WNW and lighter 8 mph S winds, making for cleaner surf at the same spots. Day after, the swell drops to 4 ft @ 10s NW with moderate 12 mph W winds, still offering fun waves. Best: tomorrow.
